CN.content:

Paragraph: PSCs using PffBX-TT:PC71BM as an active layer gave a maximum PCE of 9.10% .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PSCs (Photovoltaic Solar Cells)
2. PffBX-TT (unspecified material)
3. PC71BM (specific material)

Therefore, the list of material names in the paragraph is:

1. PSCs
2. PffBX-TT
3. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! My apologies for the confusion earlier. Here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph:

1. PC71BM

So, the list of material names in the paragraph is:

1. PC71BM

| Material Name |
| --- |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs using PffBX-TT:PC71BM as an active layer gave a maximum PCE of 9.10% .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - The maximum PCE of 9.10% is a property value that is being reported or measured.
2. PSCs (Photovoltaic Cells) - The paragraph mentions that the PCE was achieved using PSCs as an active layer, which implies that the PSCs have a certain property value (i.e., their photovoltaic conversion efficiency).
3. PC71BM (Polymer-Interdigitated Back-Contact) - The paragraph mentions PC71BM as the active layer used in the PSCs, which implies that PC71BM has a certain property value (i.e., its photovoltaic conversion efficiency).

Therefore, the three "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are:

1. PCE (9.10%)
2. PSCs (9.10%)
3. PC71BM (9.10%)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, I apologize for the confusion earlier. Based on your latest clarification, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - The maximum PCE of 9.10% is a value that refers to the efficiency of the material property of the photovoltaic cells.
2. PC71BM (Polymer-Interdigitated Back-Contact) - The value of 9.10% is also a reference to the material property of PC71BM, specifically its photovoltaic conversion efficiency.

Therefore, the two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph are:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. PC71BM (Polymer-Interdigitated Back-Contact)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) | 9.10% |
| PC71BM (Polymer-Interdigitated Back-Contact) | 9.10% |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
